data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
The first-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Foxborough.
In Foxborough a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for New England in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to New England.
In Foxborough New England drive forward through Teal Bunbury. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Can Chicago capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New England's half?
Fabian Herbers (Chicago) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Adam Buksa gets his shot on target but fails to score for New England.
New England are coming forward and Diego Fagundez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
Throw-in Chicago.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chicago drive upfield and Mauricio Pineda gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a New England defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Chicago in Foxborough.
Fotis Bazakos signals a Chicago throw-in in New England's half.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Free kick for Chicago in the half of New England.
Chicago to take a throw-in in New England territory.
Throw-in for Chicago in the half of New England.
Chicago have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fotis Bazakos awards the away team a throw-in.
New England to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
Free kick New England.
Fotis Bazakos awards Chicago a goal kick.
Free kick New England.
Chicago needs to be cautious. New England have an attacking throw-in.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Foxborough to check on Adam Buksa, who is grimacing with pain.
New England's Adam Buksa looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Chicago in the half of New England.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Adam Buksa.
That's a fine assist from Brandon Bye.
Gustavo Bou of New England smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Chicago drives forward and Fabian Herbers gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Throw-in for New England close to the penalty box.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos signals a throw-in for New England, close to Chicago's area.
Fotis Bazakos signals a Chicago throw-in in New England's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
Chicago to take a throw-in in New England territory.
Throw-in for Chicago in the half of New England.
Chicago pushes forward through Jonathan Bornstein, whose finish on goal is saved.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
New England's Henry Kessler has been booked in Foxborough.
Throw-in Chicago.
Throw-in for Chicago close to the penalty box.
In Foxborough Chicago attack through Robert Beric. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for New England in Foxborough.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Johan Kappelhof for Chicago has been booked by Fotis Bazakos and receives a first yellow card.
New England have a goal kick.
Fotis Bazakos signals a New England throw-in in Chicago's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
In Foxborough a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Chicago.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Gustavo Bou for New England gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Chicago at Gillette Stadium.
Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Foxborough.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos awards New England a goal kick.
Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New England's half?
Fotis Bazakos signals a Chicago throw-in in New England's half.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chicago make their first substitution with Gaston Gimenez replacing Brandt Bronico.
Attention is being given to New England’s Wilfried Zahibo and play has been suspended briefly.
Wilfried Zahibo has recovered and rejoins the match in Foxborough.
New England have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Chicago to take a throw-in in New England territory.
New England are pushing forward but Cristian Penilla's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Chicago at Gillette Stadium.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Teal Bunbury for New England drives towards goal at Gillette Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal! Chicago draw level to 1-1 through a Jonathan Bornstein header.
Great play from Djordje Mihailovic to set up the goal.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos awards the away team a throw-in.
Chicago will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from New England.
New England's Gustavo Bou gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Chicago defender.
Corner awarded to New England.
New England's Adam Buksa gets in a shot on goal at Gillette Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in New England.
Chicago's Gaston Gimenez is on target but unsuccessful.
Can New England capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chicago's half?
Fotis Bazakos signals a throw-in for New England, close to Chicago's area.
Justin Rennicks is on a sub for Teal Bunbury for New England.
New England drives forward and Brandon Bye gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Chicago at Gillette Stadium.
The home team replace Cristian Penilla with Tajon Buchanan.
Fotis Bazakos awards the away team a throw-in.
Miguel Navarro is replacing Jonathan Bornstein for the away team.
Throw-in for New England in the half of Chicago.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chicago to take a throw-in in New England territory.
New England push forward at Gillette Stadium and Tajon Buchanan gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Chicago defence.
New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for New England in the half of Chicago.
Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos awards Chicago a goal kick.
Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
The match at Gillette Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Fabian Herbers, who is down injured.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Chicago’s Fabian Herbers is on his feet again at Gillette Stadium.
Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
New England needs to be cautious. Chicago have an attacking throw-in.
Chicago's Gaston Gimenez breaks free at Gillette Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Foxborough.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Corner awarded to New England.
In Foxborough, Diego Fagundez of New England is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
New England have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
At Gillette Stadium, DeJuan Jones has been yellow-carded for the home team.
